item.title: US Coast Guard actively pursuing another sanctioned vessel: Official
item.description: The Coast Guard also seized an oil tanker off the coast of Venezuela Saturday.

item.title: Efforts ongoing to restore power to San Francisco areas following outage
item.description: The majority of affected customers in San Francisco have had their power restored after outages that began Saturday, according to PG&E.

item.title: WATCH: Middle school principal transforms into Elf on a Shelf
item.description: Principal Erica Cobb at Glenwood Middle School in Findlay, Ohio, transformed herself into an Elf on the Shelf to the delight of students.

item.title: Suspects sought after 9 killed in South Africa tavern mass shooting
item.description: A group of about a dozen assailants opened fire Sunday at a tavern in a South African township, police said.

item.title: WATCH: Educator goes big with lessons involving a 43-foot whale
item.description: ABC News' Danny New explains why Jessica Woodend is travelling around her home state of Maine with a giant inflatable whale.
